casebody.data:
STATE v. ALBRITTAIN. No. COA06-640. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed February 6, 2007. Certification Date February 26, 2007. Appeal from the Wayne (05CRS51688, 05CRS51689, 05CRS51690, 05CRS51691, 05CRS51694, 05CRS51709, 05CRS51833).

Case Reported Without Published Opinion. Reversed and remanded.
